F5 Distributed Cloud - Advanced Bot Security¶

Welcome¶

In this lab, attendees will review and explore more advanced services within F5 Distributed Cloud platform. Lab tasks will focus on providing a deeper review & understanding of AI-driven BotDefense security, integration of Client-Side Defense (CSD), and enablement of additional visibility through Application Traffic Insight (ATI).

Objectives:¶

  • Gain a deeper understanding of key F5 Distributed Cloud security functions and controls
  • Gain an understanding of BotDefense, Client-Side Defense and Application Traffic Insight.

Lab & Tasks:¶

  • All Lab requirements will be noted in the tasks that follow
  • Estimated completion time: 4 Labs of varying lengths

Labs:

  • Introduction: Accessing Lab Resources
    • Task 1: Lab Environment
    • Task 2: F5 Distributed Cloud Console Login
    • Task 3: Accessing your Lab Jumphost
  • Lab 1: Deploying Load Balancer, Configuring F5 Distributed Cloud BotDefense
    • Task 1: Configure Load Balancer, Origin Pool, WAF and BotDefense
    • Task 2: Curl - Direct
    • Task 3: Compare Via Bot Defense
  • Lab 2: Basic Attack Automation
  • Lab 3: Human Like Automation
  • Lab 4: F5 Distributed Cloud Bot Defense connector for BIG-IP
    • Task 1: Define the protected application in F5 Distributed Cloud Bot Defense
    • Task 2: Configure F5 BIGIP Distributed Cloud Bot Defense connector profile
    • Task 3: Test and Monitor Protected Traffic
  • Conclusion
  • Appendix
